title: Smartphone penetration as share of connections in Pakistan 2014 to 2020
summary: Overall Percentage of connections has increased over the Year.
Percentage of connections is slightly increasing from 2014 to 2018.
The most drastic increase took place within the Year 2017 and 2018.
The highest Percentage of connections, of value 34.0 was reached at Year 2018
Minimum Percentage of connections about 10.0 was reached at Year 2014
